answerFilterLayout.name: toxo_advanced
answerFilterLayout.displayName: Advanced comparison of similarities and differences between strains.

instance.name: boolean_expansion
instance.description: All instances from all genes in result

instance.name: toxo_instances
instance.description: Cumulative number of T. gondii hits in all strains (note: likely to be redundant).

instance.name: deprecated_genes
instance.description: Giardia lamblia deprecated genes. These are previously annotated genes that newer annotation has shown to have insufficient evidence.

instance.name: portal_distinct_genes
instance.description: Number of ortholog groups with hits in any species: the representative gene in result is from PlasmoDB if it exists, otherwise from TriTrypDB if it exists, otherwise from CryptoDB if it exists, otherwise from ToxoDB if it exists, otherwise from GiardiaDB if it exists, otherwise from TrichDB.

instance.name: tcu_genes
instance.description: All Trypanosoma cruzi results which were not designated "esmeraldo" or "non-esmeraldo"

instance.name: deprecated_genes
instance.description:
Giardia lamblia ATCC 50803 deprecated genes.
These are previously annotated genes that newer annotation has shown to have insufficient evidence.

instance.name: toxo_genes
instance.description: Number of non-redundant T. gondii genes, with hits in any strain (the representative gene is: ME49 if it exists, otherwise GT1 if it exists, otherwise VEG.

instance.name: crypto_distinct_genes
instance.description: Number of Cryptosporidium ortholog groups with hits in any species: the representative gene result is: C. parvum if it exists, otherwise C. hominis if it exists, otherwise C. muris if it exists, otherwise C. parvum chromosome 6.

instance.name: tc_distinct_genes
instance.description: Number of non-redundant T.cruzi genes (the representative gene is: T.cruzi esmeraldo if it exists, otherwise T.cruzi non-esmeraldo if it exists, otherwise T.cruzi unassigned.

instance.name: tritryp_distinct_genes
instance.description: Number of ortholog groups across available species (the representative gene is: T.brucei if it exists, otherwise L.braziliensis if it exists, otherwise L.infantum if it exists, otherwise L.major if it exists, otherwise T.cruzi.

instance.name: plasmo_ortholog_groups
instance.description: Number of ortholog groups across available species (the representative gene is: P.falciparum if it exists, otherwise P. vivax if it exists, otherwise P. yoelii if it exists, otherwise P. berghei if it exists, otherwise P. chabaudi if it exists, otherwise P. knowlesi.

instance.name: each_tg_instance
instance.description: Number of T.gondii genes in the result that have exactly one instance from each strain.

instance.name: all_min_gt1
instance.description: T. gondii genes without a GT1 result

instance.name: all_min_me49
instance.description: T. gondii genes without a ME49 result

instance.name: all_min_veg
instance.description: T. gondii genes without a VEG result

instance.name: gt1_min_me49
instance.description: Genes that have a GT1 result but not an ME49 result

instance.name: gt1_min_veg
instance.description: Genes that have a GT1 result but not a VEG result

instance.name: me49_min_gt1
instance.description: Genes that have an ME49 result but not a GT1 result

instance.name: me49_min_veg
instance.description: Genes that have an ME49 result but not a VEG result

instance.name: veg_min_gt1
instance.description: Genes that have a VEG result but not a GT1 result

instance.name: veg_min_me49
instance.description: Genes that have a VEG result but not an ME49 result

instance.name: gt1_int_me49
instance.description: Genes that have both GT1 and ME49 results

instance.name: gt1_int_veg
instance.description: Genes that have both GT1 and VEG results

instance.name: me49_int_veg
instance.description: Genes that have both ME49 and VEG results

textAttribute.name: tree_applet_link
textAttribute.text: Consensus tree

table.name: ToxoStrainsMicroarrayPercentile
table.displayName: Three archetypal T. gondii lineages - Percentiles

table.name: TwoChannelDiffExpr
table.displayName: P.Berghei Differential Expression - DOZI KO vs. WT

table.name: PdbSimilarities
table.displayName: Similarities to Protein Data Bank (PDB) Chains
